Class InventoryManager

java.lang.Object
org.CSPT.sc2001_grp1_proj1.entity.InventoryManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
InventoryManagerInterface
public class InventoryManager extends Object implements InventoryManagerInterface
This class is responsible for managing the inventory of medicines, including adding/removing stock, updating stock count and alert levels, displaying inventory, handling replenishment requests, and managing medicine details. It implements the InventoryManagerInterface interface to ensure required methods are included.

  • Constructor Details

    • InventoryManager

      public InventoryManager(List<Medicine> totalMedicineInventoryList, LocalDateTime lastUpdatedTime, String system)
      Constructor for the InventoryManager class.
      Parameters:
      totalMedicineInventoryList - List of all medicines in the inventory.
      lastUpdatedTime - Timestamp when the inventory was last updated.
      system - The name of the system or user that last updated the inventory.

  • Method Details

    • replenishmentRequestInit

      public void replenishmentRequestInit()
      Initializes the replenishment request list by loading from a data source.

    • addStock

      public void addStock()
      Adds stock to an existing medicine in the inventory. Prompts the user to enter a medicine name, finds the corresponding medicine in the inventory, and increases the stock count by 1. Displays a success or error message based on the input.
      Specified by:
      addStock in interface InventoryManagerInterface

    • removeStock

      public void removeStock()
      Removes stock from an existing medicine in the inventory. Prompts the user to enter a medicine name, finds the corresponding medicine in the inventory, and decreases the stock count by 1. Displays a success or error message based on the input.
      Specified by:
      removeStock in interface InventoryManagerInterface

    • updateStockCount

      public void updateStockCount()
      Updates the stock count for a specific medicine. Prompts the user to enter a medicine name and the number of stocks to add. The input must be a positive integer; otherwise, an error message is displayed.
      Specified by:
      updateStockCount in interface InventoryManagerInterface

    • updateStockAlertLevel

      public void updateStockAlertLevel()
      Updates the low stock alert level for a specific medicine. Prompts the user to enter a medicine name and a new stock alert level. The input must be a positive integer; otherwise, an error message is displayed.
      Specified by:
      updateStockAlertLevel in interface InventoryManagerInterface

    • displayStock

      public void displayStock()
      Displays the current stock of all medicines in the inventory. The displayed information includes the medicine name, stock count, low stock alert, and alert level.
      Specified by:
      displayStock in interface InventoryManagerInterface

    • displayReplenishmentRequests

      public void displayReplenishmentRequests()
      Displays all the replenishment requests that are pending. The displayed information includes request ID, medicine name, quantity, requested by, and request status.
      Specified by:
      displayReplenishmentRequests in interface InventoryManagerInterface

    • approveReplenishmentRequests

      public void approveReplenishmentRequests()
      Approves a replenishment request for a medicine. Prompts the user to enter the name of the medicine whose replenishment request is to be approved. Once approved, the stock for the corresponding medicine is updated and the request status is marked as "Approved".
      Specified by:
      approveReplenishmentRequests in interface InventoryManagerInterface

    • addMedicine

      public void addMedicine()
      Adds a new medicine to the inventory. Prompts the user to enter the medicine name, details, stock count, and low stock alert level. Performs validation for non-negative stock values and ensures the alert level is not greater than the stock count.
      Specified by:
      addMedicine in interface InventoryManagerInterface

    • updateMedicine

      public void updateMedicine()
      Updates the details of an existing medicine. Prompts the user to select which detail (medicine name, detail, stock count, or alert level) they want to update. Allows canceling the update if the user chooses to do so.
      Specified by:
      updateMedicine in interface InventoryManagerInterface

    • removeMedicine

      public void removeMedicine()
      Removes an existing medicine from the inventory. Prompts the user to enter the medicine name and removes the corresponding medicine from the inventory.
      Specified by:
      removeMedicine in interface InventoryManagerInterface
